title: How Your Body Posture Communicates Feelings to Others
excerpt: New research suggests that body postures can reveal our emotions to other people—and maybe even change how we feel inside.

title: How To Get An MBA From Eminem
excerpt: In 2002 I was driving to a hedge fund manager's house to hopefully raise money from him. I was two hours late. This was pre-GPS and I had no cell phone. I was totally lost. I kept playing over and over again "Lose Yourself" by Eminem. I was afraid this was my one shot and I was blowing it. I was even crying in my car. I was going broke and I felt this was my one chance. What a loser.

title: Assertiveness is a virtue that anyone can develop with practice | Psyche Id
excerpt: You can’t stop people making demands on your time and energy, but you can develop assertiveness skills to protect yourself

title: One simple way to build someone’s confidence: Ask for their advice
excerpt: When we want people to change, we typically tell them what to do. But what if we flipped the script and asked them for their wisdom instead? Behavioral scientist Katy Milkman PhD explains the power…

title: How to Talk to People You Disagree With
excerpt: Bridge the divide with thoughtful conversation techniques, next-level listening, and a dip into the science of changing minds.
